_sText:
The zombie exhibit is coming to the museum! That's odd, it seems to have gone missing... this section of the city has been quarantined until the virus is contained. Map features a few custom textures I made, good variety of places to hold off the zombies from, and lots of hidden secrets! One of the secrets even contains a song composed by me! This map is intended for large servers.

==========8/3/2011 UPDATE:===========
Fixed missing textures / sound / whack cube maps
New BSP filename is zm_exhibit_v1F2



Download my latest version of this map here:
http://www.gamebanana.com/maps/158737
